titles.title: Revolutionary War and War of 1812 Battlefields Commemorative Coin Act of 2012
Revolutionary War and War of 1812 Battlefields Commemorative Coin Act of 2012
To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the battlefields of the Revolutionary War and the War of 1812, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy and Technology.

bill.summary: Revolutionary War and War of 1812 Battlefields Commemorative Coin Act of 2012 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue five-dollar gold coins, one-dollar silver coins, and half-dollar clad coins emblematic of the Revolutionary War and the War of 1812.
